page.title: 08School (2)
page.content:
On Monday the Vicar comes in to show some slides on the projector and then we get our diaries and write about the weekend.On Wednesday we go swimming but on the other days we do maths. Next we go out for playtime and do English till lunchtime.We have packed lunches.Then we have another playtime. In the afternoon we do different things.On Monday we do craft,on Tuesday art,on Wednesday topic.On Thursday we have games,on Friday we have interest topic.Next we have an afternoon playtime.After playtime we listen to a story or talk about our clubs.Then we get our lunch boxes and get on the bus. At home I watch T.V.till teatime. David soon comes home and Mum makes me go to bed any time after 8.30.
Sarah Tamplin
